title: Les Trois Grâces (The Three Graces)
text: The Three Graces is a detail from Jean-Baptiste Carpeaux's most important figural group, <I>La Génie de la Danse<I> (<I>Genius of the Dance<I>) executed in 1868 for the façade of the Paris Opera House. The original <I>Genius of the Dance<I> is now in the Musée d'Orsay in Paris.
description: \'The Three Graces\', plaster, French XIXc cat. card dims H 32-1/2 x W 18-1/2\'; measurements above of base and sculpture; Base (b) is on R5A3.2 MS
